news.title: Mother who killed her three children sues coroner over limits placed on inquest
news.summary: A mentally ill mother who killed her three children has initiated a lawsuit challenging a coroner’s decision to limit the scope of their inquests.

news.title: Father Ted co-creator Graham Linehan cleared of harassing transgender activist, but found guilty of criminal damage
news.summary: Father Ted co-creator Graham Linehan has been cleared of harassing a transgender activist on social media but found guilty of criminal damage of their mobile phone outside a conference in London last year.

news.title: Man who knocked down cottage and replaced it with bungalow without planning permission is granted retention following appeal
news.summary: A man who knocked down a cottage and replaced it with a modern bungalow without planning permission has been granted retention by An Coimisiún Pleanála.

news.title: How should you spend an inheritance received after the age of 50?
news.summary: They call it the ‘sandwich generation’ ­­­– those people in mid-life who are minding ageing parents while tending to a young family themselves.

news.title: Lucinda O’Sullivan’s restaurant review: Chef collab events are gaining popularity and it’s easy to see why going by my visit to this city hotspot
news.summary: Patrick Guilbaud’s is Dublin's only two Michelin-starred restaurant. The eponymous restaurant opened its doors in 1981. It has been frequented by celebrities and politicians.

news.title: Woman who died after knife attack in Cork hailed as someone who ‘brought joy into the lives of all she met’, funeral hears
news.summary: A mother who died after a knife attack which also left her husband seriously injured was described as someone who brought joy into the lives of every person she met.

news.title: ‘I lost the baby, it was around the time of Ann Lovett… and I couldn’t tell my parents’ – Eleanor McEvoy on the pain of loss and of making her own family
news.summary: ‘Dying is part of life,” Eleanor McEvoy says. The singer-songwriter who rose to fame when she wrote  A Woman’s Heart  is here to talk about performing at Our Lady’s hospice in Harold’s Cross on December 7.

news.title: Tadhg Beirne named as Ireland’s sole representative in World Rugby team of the year
news.summary: Munster and Ireland second-row Tadhg Beirne has been included in the World Rugby dream team for the second year running.

news.title: Man (25) jailed for six years after raping student (17) who was within sight of her house on walk home from party
news.summary: A 25-year-old man who subjected a 17-year-old student to a 20-minute ordeal when he dragged her in to a secluded grassy area of an estate in West Cork and raped her has been jailed for six years.

news.title: Legal advice: ‘I've been using my neighbour's laneway for as long as I can remember. Can the new owners lock me out of my land?’
news.summary: Query:  Dear Mary Frances, I hope you can advise me because I am in a very troubling situation. I have a field that I can only reach by travelling up a laneway that lies entirely on my neighbour’s property.
